EmailTemplate.name: Turbonomic and the path to the cloud (and beyond) (1493036900.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic and the path to the cloud (and beyond) (1493036900.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 98 Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Tom,I wanted to reach out to get some time on the calendar to connect and introduce you to Turbonomic and how our control solution has been enabling businesses like Verizon, Cisco, HP and BMC to be more performant, efficient and agile with their virtual and cloud infrastructures. In case you want a quick review of Turbonomic, below are links to data sheets with information on what our software does and the problem we solve. Turbonomic Overiew <[[http://t.sidekickopen69.com/e1t/c/5/f18dQhb0S7lC8dDMPbW2n0x6l2B9nMJN7t5XYgdVn3dW8qSQCx76hVPRN72kTf31sBwYf7xKJSz03?t=http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.vmturbo.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2016%2F03%2FVMTurbo-Operations-Manager-Data-Sheet.pdf&si=6013571735748608&pi=506778dc-f66c-4c92-a181-578bc0c9b471]]> Turbonomic Control For Any Cloud <[[http://t.sidekickopen69.com/e1t/c/5/f18dQhb0S7lC8dDMPbW2n0x6l2B9nMJN7t5XYgdVn3dW8qSQCx76hVPRN72kTf31sBwYf7xKJSz03?t=http%3A%2F%2Fvmturbo.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2016%2F01%2FVMT-CTRL-for-Any-Cloud-Jan-2016.pdf&si=6013571735748608&pi=506778dc-f66c-4c92-a181-578bc0c9b471]]> I would love to schedule a quick phone call to see if it makes sense to look at the software, or to just touch base in general. Let me know what the next week looks like for you in terms of a quick phone call.Looking forward to connecting,Katie Katie NorchiSales Development RepresentativeO: 857.305.4618 C: 440.708.8477500 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116
